privacy_page.title: Privacy at Zidni AI
privacy_page.intro: Zidni AI protects the data that powers your AI workspace, live cohorts, assessments, and notifications. This summary explains how we handle information for every tenant, educator, and learner.

sections.title: The information we collect
paragraphs: We only collect information needed to operate Zidni AIâ€™s multi-tenant learning platform and AI assistants.
bullets: Account, tenant, and billing details provided by platform owners and administrators.
Learning content, assessment submissions, feedback, and tutoring notes created inside the AI lesson studio and assessment workflows.
Engagement signals from live sessions, chat, polls, offers, and notifications so we can deliver reliable experiences in real time.

sections.title: How we use your information
paragraphs: Data enables Zidni AI to author content with AI copilots, roster cohorts, process payments, and surface analytics across your tenants.
bullets: Delivering core features like assessment grading, live attendance, catalog syndication, and proactive alerts.
Training tenant-level AI models with anonymised context so assistants can draft lessons and summaries securely.
Improving product reliability, for example monitoring API usage to prevent downtime during exams or live sessions.

sections.title: How we protect and retain data
paragraphs: Zidni AI encrypts data in transit and at rest, limits access to vetted staff, and keeps audit logs across every workflow.
We retain learner and financial records only for the periods required by law or to support your contractual commitments.

sections.title: Your choices and controls
paragraphs: Platform owners can export or delete tenant data by contacting support. Learners can request access, correction, or deletion of their records at any time.
We notify administrators when workflows rely on third-party integrations so you can manage consent with your communities.

cta.title: Questions about privacy?
paragraphs: Our trust team is available to discuss data protection impact assessments, regional hosting, and custom retention policies.

terms_page.title: Zidni Terms of Use Agreement
terms_page.intro: These terms explain how educators and learners use the Zidni platform. By creating an account, you agree to the rules below.

sections.title: 1. Our relationship
paragraphs: By creating your account, we consider you a partner and you agree to these terms. We keep improving the platform, so we may update these terms to deliver better features. We will always notify you of any important changes that affect you.

sections.title: 2. Your video journey on Zidni
paragraphs: Automatic quality optimization keeps lessons smooth even on weak connections (up to 720p or 1080p depending on your plan).
After processing is complete, we delete the original raw upload to make room for new videos, so keep your original copy on your device.
Each plan includes a storage allowance by hours or words. You can upgrade or add extra storage at any time.

sections.title: 3. Viewing and consumption
paragraphs: You receive a monthly viewing minutes quota. If students consume it, you can add extra minutes to keep learning uninterrupted.
We apply fair-use protections to prevent abnormal load and keep the platform stable for everyone.

sections.title: 4. Your intellectual property
paragraphs: Your content is yours. We are simply the home for hosting your knowledge and do not claim ownership of your uploads.
You are responsible for ensuring you have the rights to any content you upload.

sections.title: 5. Subscription and payment
paragraphs: Subscriptions renew automatically to avoid service interruption. You can cancel from account settings at least 24 hours before renewal.
Because we reserve server resources and begin processing immediately, payments are non-refundable. You still receive the full value of your subscription period.

sections.title: 6. Keeping the Zidni community safe
paragraphs: We are committed to a safe learning environment. Content that violates laws or public morals is not accepted. In rare cases, we may suspend accounts that misuse the system in ways that harm others.

sections.title: 7. Service stability
paragraphs: Our technical team works around the clock to keep the platform available at 99%. If an outage occurs beyond our control (for example, global cloud providers), we will notify you and work to resolve it quickly.

cta.title: Questions about these terms?
paragraphs: Our support team is always ready to help if you need any clarification.

support_page.title: Zidni AI Help & Support
support_page.intro: We combine documentation, proactive monitoring, and human expertise to keep your AI workspace, assessments, and live sessions running smoothly.

sections.title: How to reach us
paragraphs: Our support engineers and learning specialists provide coverage across EMEA working hours with priority routing for critical issues.
bullets: Email support@Zidni AI.app for account, billing, privacy, or data export requests.
Use the in-app help widget to chat with our team when configuring AI lesson studios, assessments, or offers.
Join weekly office hours for implementation walkthroughs and roadmap updates.

sections.title: Onboarding and training resources
paragraphs: We provide multilingual guides so teams can launch new tenants, automate workflows, and adopt AI copilots responsibly.

sections.title: Incident response
paragraphs: We monitor live classrooms, notifications, and integrations around the clock. Critical alerts trigger our on-call response immediately.
bullets: Real-time status updates are posted when assessments, payments, or live services are degraded.
Post-incident reviews are shared with tenant admins along with preventative recommendations.

sections.title: Feature-specific guidance
paragraphs: Need help designing assessments, scheduling cohorts, or enabling new AI copilots? Our specialists provide targeted coaching.
bullets: Assessment builders: mapping competencies, auto-grading, and SIS exports.
Live learning: attendance automation, chat moderation, and poll analytics.
Offers and storefronts: pricing strategies, promo codes, and catalog syndication.
